name: Mother New York
tagline: Do great work. Have fun. Make a living.
description: Mother is a creative company with offices in New York, London and Buenos Aires. Founded around a kitchen table in 1996, Mother is recognized as one of the worldâ€™s most creative businesses working with iconic brands such as Target, Stella Artois, The Home Depot, IKEA, Boots and Coca-Cola among many more. They remain fiercely independent.
